synopsis.text: After stumbling upon a seemingly ordinary cosmetic product called "Beauty Water," an average girl named Yaeji discovers its extraordinary power to transform her appearance, allowing her to sculpt her skin like clay. Desperate to escape the torment of cyberbullying and her humdrum life as an assistant to a beautiful actress, Yaeji becomes consumed by her desire to attain perfect beauty. However, as she continues to use the mysterious water, she realizes that its misuse comes with dire consequences, and her pursuit of beauty may lead her down a dangerous path. Will Yaeji's longing for love and acceptance ultimately bring her ruin, or can she find a way to overcome the dark side of "Beauty Water"?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
